entry: (Someone seems to be asleep in there.)
who: I haven't seen you before. Are you an item?
questions: ►[not asked_aboud_sleeping]I thought someone was sleeping in there. @sleeping
what: But a basic one, I can't even move properly.
It looks really silly when I jump to move forward, so I don't do it when people are around.
items: No, we mimics usually don't carry items. !set asked_about_items true
Some do, but that only incentivizes unnecessary violence.
There's no need to attack a mimic who doesn't hold items, no?
sleeping: Oh, a common mistake! !set asked_aboud_sleeping true
The people I eat usually don't have the capacity to make sleep noises anymore.
But that was a long time ago. I'm living the vegan lifestyle now.
I moved here when I heard how peaceful it was. @sleeping_questions
eat: Or whatever is prepared when I'm around. I can't really cook for myself. @sleeping_questions
lucky: If you had met me when I was still working as a trap for adventurers, you would be crushed and dismembered by now. @questions
